title: The Troop grows
creator_credit: Boy Scouts of America. Visual Education Service
brief_description: This film is not intended for public promotional purposes, but is aimed at the Scoutmaster, in the belief that he is the key to a successful recruiting program. The film serves as an introduction, telling the story of how one scoutmaster solved his particular problems, discovering that they were tied up together with good program and boy leadership.
